title: Mahatma Gandhi and Narendra Modi are both from Gujatat. What are the similarities between them in their ways of thinking, patriotism, politics, administration, leadership qualities, lifestyle, etc.? Who is a more practical thinker? - Quora

response.answer_text: Gandhi and modi both took celibacy(refrained from sex life) for making their mother land beautiful. Gandhi is completely spiritual man unlike modi Both are secular more tolerant than any other politician. There is so much difference in their lifestyles gandhi don't wear costly clothes only wears dhoti. He travelled london by wearing only dhoti with a goat for round table conference in 1930s his counterpart churchill called him as “half naked fakir”.Modi is completely different he wears Costly dresses looks fashionable. Gandhi and modi both treated dalits as the children of god(Harijan) Modi has initiated swach bharat program following gandhi to keep ourselves clean and to protect our lives from various diseases. Finally both strive for making country beautiful.
